title: I Will Stand in the Light
author: Heath Houston

sentences.a418: I Will Stand in the Light

sentences.6863: I don’t know if this is itI’ve been wrong beforeI can’t tell you everything will workwhen I’ve had it all fall apartI can’t see where this is goingwhen all I can see is you,but I will stand in the lightand give you my heart.

sentences.f80e: I can’t promise you blue skieswhen it always seems to rainI don’t know what path to takewhen we’ve both got our ownI won’t always be the strong onesometimes you’ll have to be,but I will stand in the lightand give you my heart.

sentences.a98d: I don’t know if you’ll change your mindIt’s happened beforeI can’t promise I won’t fall on my facewhen I give it everything I’ve got,but my belief is stronger than my doubtwhen I make this promise:I will stand with you in the lightand give you my heart.

content: CC0 I Will Stand in the Light I don’t know if this is itI’ve been wrong beforeI can’t tell you everything will workwhen I’ve had it all fall apartI can’t see where this is goingwhen all I can see is you,but I will stand in the lightand give you my heart. I can’t promise you blue skieswhen it always seems to rainI don’t know what path to takewhen we’ve both got our ownI won’t always be the strong onesometimes you’ll have to be,but I will stand in the lightand give you my heart. I don’t know if you’ll change your mindIt’s happened beforeI can’t promise I won’t fall on my facewhen I give it everything I’ve got,but my belief is stronger than my doubtwhen I make this promise:I will stand with you in the lightand give you my heart.
